definition: individual/this/that/size/classifier for people or objects in general

pinyin: ge4 ren2 shu4 zi4 zhu4 li3
ge4 ren2 fang2 hu4 zhuang1 bei4

definition: the master leads you to the door, the rest is up to you/you can lead a horse to water but you can't make him drink
pinyin: shi1 fu5 ling3 jin4 men2 , xiu1 xing2 zai4 ge4 ren2
containing_words.word: 师父领进门，修行在个人

definition: the second person/(fig.) someone else/third party

sentences.english: I have nothing but some personal belongings.
sentences.chinese: 我只带了一些个人用品。

sentences.english: But as a private individual, I just ignore such people.
sentences.chinese: 但如果我是作为个人，对这种人我就根本不予理睬。

sentences.english: Andre says here's a clear principle,the most particular.
sentences.chinese: 安德烈说这里有一个明确的原则，最个人的。

sentences.english: Today girls are going for the women's individual all-around final.
sentences.chinese: 今天女孩子们要为个人全能拼搏了。

sentences.english: There are also the purely personal predilections of each individual musician.
sentences.chinese: 每一个音乐家都有完全个人的偏爱。

sentences.english: Big brother says the paper is due tomorrow, or else.
sentences.chinese: 老师说，论文明天应交，否则后果由个人负责。

sentences.english: In 1999, ethnic unity and progress has been exemplary Linying advanced individuals.
sentences.chinese: 1999年，获临颍县民族团结进步模范先进个人。

sentences.english: The newly discovered notes are nothing more than Jack's personal journal.
sentences.chinese: 新发现的笔记只不过是杰克的个人日记。

sentences.english: I will start from their own, the Japanese learn their advantages.
sentences.chinese: 我也会从个人做起，向日本人学习他们的优点。

sentences.english: A powerful personal growth tool is the 30-day trial.
sentences.chinese: 有一种个人成长的有效工具，叫做“30天试验”。

sentences.english: Consult personal sites only when you are convinced of their reliability.
sentences.chinese: 只有在您确信个人网站的可靠性后才能利用它们。

sentences.english: First, the heavy burden of personal cost.
Oscillating along the track of time, we sea our insignificant.
sentences.chinese: 摆荡在时间的轨迹，个人者发现自己何其渺小。

sentences.english: For his own personal interest, Mr. Chen ratted on his government.
sentences.chinese: 陈先生为了个人利益，背叛了他的政府。

sentences.english: We don't change things out of personal prejudice.
sentences.chinese: 不要因为个人成见而改变事物的本来面目。

sentences.english: The worst personal development mistake didn't make the list.
sentences.chinese: 我没有把最糟糕的个人发展错误列进表里。

definition: individual/this/that/size/classifier for people or objects in general
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
he or him/(used for either sex when the sex is unknown or unimportant)/(used before sb's name for emphasis)/(used as a meaningless mock object)/other/another
this/these/(commonly pr. [zhei4] before a classifier, esp. in Beijing)

at once/right away/only/just (emphasis)/as early as/already/as soon as/then/in that case/as many as/even if/to approach/to move towards/to undertake/to engage in/to suffer/subjected to/to accomplish/to take advantage of/to go with (of foods)/with regard to/concerning
next in sequence/second/the second (day, time etc)/secondary/vice-/sub-/infra-/inferior quality/substandard/order/sequence/hypo- (chemistry)/classifier for enumerated events: time
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
also/too/(in Classical Chinese) final particle implying affirmation
(completed action marker)/(modal particle indicating change of state, situation now)/(modal particle intensifying preceding clause)
to finish/to achieve/variant of 瞭|了[liao3]/to understand clearly
grain that has begun to ripen/variant of 衹|只[zhi3]
classifier for birds and certain animals, one of a pair, some utensils, vessels etc
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc
